subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rick Ankiel slapped a two-run single to right field with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning to cap a three-run rally and lead the host St. Louis Cardinals to a 5-4 win over the Chicago Cubs.
snippet: Rick Ankiel slapped a two-run single to right field with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning to cap a three-run rally and lead the host St. Louis Cardinals to a 5-4 win over the Chicago Cubs.
